```{webr}
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
data(trees)
trees$Diam <- trees$Girth / 12
trees$Girth <- NULL
names(trees)

gg_height <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Height, y = Volume)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))

gg_girth <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Girth, y = Volume)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))
```



```{webr}
tree_lm <- lm(Volume ~ Diam + Height, data = trees)
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(tree_lm)
```
